About

I'm an experienced iOS developer with over a decade of expertise in end-to-end mobile app development. My skills cover API integration, unit testing, and App Store releases, ensuring high-quality applications that deliver seamless user experiences. I specialize in building efficient, user-focused apps that combine technical excellence with intuitive design, fostering user engagement and satisfaction.

With a foundation in Applied Mathematics, I’ve transitioned into Machine Learning and MLOps, focusing on AI-driven solutions. I have experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn, as well as tools like MLflow and AWS Cloud. My aim is to build scalable, data-driven systems that address real-world challenges and contribute to innovative ML projects.

Contact Me

Let’s connect and explore how I can contribute to innovative projects and bring value to your organization!

mihran.dovlatyan@gmail.com

Around the Web

Baby Food

Provides nutritious and delicious baby food recipes, ideal for children from 6 months. With over 70 solid meal options, users can filter recipes by age and meal time, follow simple step-by-step instructions, and save favorites. Additional features include a shopping list, recipe search, and the ability to share recipes via social networks.

View Page

SecurePIM

SecurePIM is a secure and intuitive mobile team collaboration solution designed for authorities and organizations. It combines essential business features such as email, messenger, contacts, calendar, tasks, notes, web browser, documents, and camera—all in one app, while ensuring GDPR compliance. With SecurePIM, employees can securely use their mobile devices for both work and personal purposes, with corporate data stored separately in a secure container. It supports central app configuration, MDM solutions, and integrates with existing infrastructures such as MS Exchange, Active Directory, and SharePoint. Key features include secure email management with S/MIME encryption, team mailboxes, secure messaging, calendar integration, and secure file access.

View Page

Ricardo.ch

The Ricardo app is Switzerland’s largest online second-hand marketplace, allowing you to buy, sell, bid, and auction new and preloved items, from vintage treasures to bargains, starting from just CHF 1. With four million members and over two million listings, you can find everything from clothing and electronics to antiques and furniture. Ricardo ensures buyer and seller protection, making it a secure marketplace for all transactions. The app also offers easy shipping through Swiss Post, and the ability to suggest prices or save searches for future offers. With a focus on sustainability, buying and selling used goods helps reduce waste and save money.

View Page

Shore Business

The Shore Business App is your portable appointment manager for smartphones and tablets, allowing you to easily manage appointments, staff work hours, and communication with customers and employees. The app syncs seamlessly with the desktop version, ensuring real-time updates across all devices. Key features include an online calendar for appointment management, customer profile handling, shift planning for iPad, and a built-in messaging system. A Shore account is required to use the app, and a free trial is available on the website.

View Page

Leben In Deutschland

With the help of this app, you can thoroughly prepare for the "Einbürgerungstest," the test required to obtain German citizenship. The app provides access to all 310 questions, including general and state-specific ones, helping you learn, practice, and improve your skills to pass the exam.

View Page

Hay Gitak

We have developed a unique quiz application exclusively in Armenian, focusing on Armenian culture, literature, history, habits, and more. What sets it apart is its interactive features, allowing users to engage in one-on-one or group competitions while testing their knowledge.

View Page

Nu, pogodi!

Real classic version of the game Nu Pogodi is offered. The game is simple, entertaining and funny, and followed by a fantastic background music from the same cartoon!

View Page

Parent Call

Parent Call is a simple application for children and old people to reach out for help if needed. Simply add the most important contacts in your list and press on the contact to make a call. You can edit contacts, change images, change order in the list. Switch to safe mode to lock the application for smaller children.
